'''''Renart the Deceiver''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mortal Travails: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect the entire "[[Fables de Fontaine]]" series.

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is a reference to {{w|Reynard the Fox}}, an anthropomorphic red fox, trickster figure mentionned in several medieval tales.
**Renart is the French equivalent of Reynard but is also the old spelling of the French word {{Fr|renard|fox.}}
*The French name of the achievement is a reference to ''Moi Renart'''s opening, a cartoon of the 80's about a fox named Renart going to Paris to scam people.
